channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: ESPNとペイトン・マニングのオマハ・プロダクションが9年間の放映権契約を結び、マンデーナイトフットボールのマニングキャストやその他の番組が含まれる（Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Alex Weprin / The Hollywood Reporter:
ESPN and Peyton Manning's Omaha Productions strike a nine-year media rights deal, which includes Monday Night Football's ManningCast and other programming  —  The deal, which runs into 2034, will include the ‘Manningcast’ for Monday Night Football and other programming.

item.title: FCCC調査：中国の報道状況はパンデミック以降改善されたが、外国人記者は依然としてビザの問題、監視、嫌がらせに直面している（ボイス・オブ・アメリカ）
item.description:
Voice of America:
FCCC survey: reporting conditions in China have improved since the pandemic, but foreign journalists still face visa problems, surveillance, and harassment  —  Reporting conditions in China have improved since the global pandemic but foreign journalists still face obstacles including visa problems …

item.title: 情報源WSJ、少なくとも11人をレイオフ、主にビジュアル・デスクとビデオ職。
item.description:
Corbin Bolies / The Daily Beast:
Sources: The WSJ lays off at least 11, primarily on its visuals desk and in video roles; some laid off were in the “Journalists as Creators” YouTube partnership  —  CHOPPING BLOCK  —  The layoffs, which came after months of cuts, impacted the social media and video desks.

item.title: 数百の政治・ニュースコンテンツ制作者がメタ社に、「政治的コンテンツ」の閲覧を拒否するスレッドとインスタグラムのデフォルト設定を元に戻すよう要請（Taylor Lorenz/Washington Post）
item.description:
Taylor Lorenz / Washington Post:
Hundreds of political and news content creators ask Meta to reverse its default Threads and Instagram setting opting accounts out of seeing “political content”  —  The change, they say, has significantly affected creators who are Black, female, disabled and LGBTQ

item.title: アダム・シフ議員は、生成AIモデルをトレーニングする企業に対し、そのために使用した著作物のすべてを開示することを義務付ける法案を提出した（Sarah Fortinsky/The Hill）。
item.description:
Sarah Fortinsky / The Hill:
Rep. Adam Schiff introduced a bill that would require companies training generative AI models to disclose all of the copyrighted work they used to do so  —  Rep. Adam Schiff (D-Calif.) unveiled legislation on Tuesday that would require companies using copyrighted material to train …

item.title: 情報筋：パラマウント・グローバル社のドーン・オストロフ、ニコール・セリグマンら3人の取締役が、パラマウント社がスカイダンス社の合併を検討しているため、取締役会を去る見込み（Jessica Toonkel/Wall Street Journal）
item.description:
Jessica Toonkel / Wall Street Journal:
Sources: three Paramount Global directors, including Dawn Ostroff and Nicole Seligman, are expected to leave the board as Paramount discusses a Skydance merger  —  Dawn Ostroff and Nicole Seligman were on the independent special committee tasked with finding the best deal for all shareholders

item.title: 英国の非営利ニュースルーム「オープン・デモクラシー」、インフレと不透明な資金を理由にスタッフ削減。
item.description:
Bron Maher / Press Gazette:
UK-based nonprofit newsroom Open Democracy cuts staff, citing inflation and uncertain funding; source: the cuts are expected to impact around 10 of its 52 staff  —  The cuts are expected to impact approximately ten of Open Democracy's 52 staff.  —  Non-profit newsroom Open Democracy …

item.title: サイモン＆シュスター社は創立100周年を迎え、KKRの投資により新規出版社の立ち上げや編集者の雇用が促進される一方、他の多くの出版社はコスト削減を図っている（ニューヨーク・タイムズ）。
item.description:
New York Times:
Simon & Schuster celebrates its 100th anniversary, as KKR's investment helps start new imprints and hire editors, while most other publishers seek to cut costs  —  The milestone comes after a particularly turbulent period, when the publisher was put up for sale and bought by a private equity firm.

item.title: CBS NewsがCBS News Streaming NetworkをCBS News 24/7に改称し、CBS News Confirmedを含め、誤報を検証する番組を拡大する計画（CBS News）
item.description:
CBS News:
CBS News rebrands CBS News Streaming Network as CBS News 24/7 and plans to expand its programming, including CBS News Confirmed, to examine misinformation  —  CBS News announced a new name and a new slate of programming for its CBS News national stream, doubling down on live coverage and unparalleled reporting from CBS News & Stations.

item.title: マーケティング担当者は、ここ数ヶ月のメタ社のプラットフォームにおける広告パフォーマンスの問題に苦言を呈し、売上が減少している一方で広告キャンペーン費用が大幅に増加していると述べている（Kurt Wagner/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Kurt Wagner / Bloomberg:
Marketers complain about ad performance issues on Meta's platforms over the past few months, saying ad campaign costs are up significantly while sales are down  —  Marketers on Facebook and Instagram notice glitches, higher prices and poorer returns on the once-reliable network

item.title: AP調査：~ニュースルームのスタッフの70％が、ソーシャルメディアの投稿、ニュースレター、見出しの執筆や編集にAIを使用しており、49％がAIがすでにワークフローを変えたと回答している（Alex Mahadevan/Poynter）
item.description:
Alex Mahadevan / Poynter:
AP survey: ~70% of newsroom staff used AI to help write or edit social media posts, newsletters, and headlines, and 49% said AI has already changed workflows  —  Despite ethical concerns, nearly 70% of newsroom staffers recruited for an Associated Press survey say they're using generative AI to create content

item.title: RobloxがPubMaticと提携、13歳以上のユーザーにゲーム内のビルボードに動画広告を表示、広告表示を選んだクリエイターは広告収入の一部を得る（Wall Street Journal）
item.description:
Wall Street Journal:
Roblox partners with PubMatic to show video ads on in-game billboards to users aged 13 and over; creators that opt to show the ads will get a cut of ad revenue  —  Roblox Users Battle Tornadoes and Raise Pets.  Will They Watch Ads, Too?  Online-entertainment company hires ad-tech player PubMatic …

item.title: メモNPRのチーフ・コンテンツ・オフィサーであるエディス・チャピンは、NPRのジャーナリズムと多様な意見を反映させるというコミットメントを擁護し、ウリ・ベルリナーの評価を否定した（David Folkenflik/NPR）
item.description:
David Folkenflik / NPR:
Memo: NPR Chief Content Officer Edith Chapin defends NPR's journalism and commitment to reflecting a diverse array of views, rejecting Uri Berliner's assessment  —  NPR's top news executive defended its journalism and its commitment to reflecting a diverse array of views on Tuesday …

item.title: ゲッティ イメージズのクレイグ・ピーターズCEOとのQ&A：ゲッティ イメージズのストック画像に学習させたAIツールを作成するためのNvidiaとの契約、AI業界標準の必要性など（Scott Roxborough/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Scott Roxborough / The Hollywood Reporter:
Q&A with Getty Images CEO Craig Peters on the deal with Nvidia to create AI tools trained on Getty's stock images, the need for AI industry standards, and more  —  The stock photo giant has entered into a deal with AI giant Nvidia to create AI tools trained on Getty's copyright-protected library of stock images.

item.title: コムキャスト社によると、パリで開催される夏季オリンピック・パラリンピックの広告販売額が過去最高の12億ドルに達し、そのうち3億5000万ドル以上が新規スポンサーによるものだという（Christopher Palmeri/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Christopher Palmeri / Bloomberg:
Comcast says it sold a record ~$1.2B in ads for the upcoming Summer Olympics and Paralympic Games in Paris, with $350M+ of the ad sales coming from new sponsors  —  The opening and closing ceremonies are sold out, according to a statement from Dan Lovinger, head of Olympics sales for Comcast's NBCUniversal …
